mlflex.learners
Class GenericArffLearner

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.learners.AbstractMachineLearner
      mlflex.learners.GenericArffLearner
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericDelimitedLearner
public class GenericArffLearner
extends AbstractMachineLearner

This class is designed to support interfacing between ML-Flex and any third-party machine-learning software that can handle input files in the ARFF format. The user specifies all command-line arguments in the Config/* files. It is also important that the third-party software output the results in a specific (simple) format and in a certain order. Within the ML-Flex distribution is a tutorial that explains more about how to do this.

Method Detail

CreateInputFile

protected java.lang.String CreateInputFile(DataInstanceCollection instances)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
This method creates an input file in the format that is specific to this learner. It is designed to be extensible to support various input file formats.

Parameters:
instances - Data instances that will be output to the file
Returns:
Path to the saved file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

SelectOrRankFeatures

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> SelectOrRankFeatures(java.lang.String commandTemplate,
                                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> algorithmParameters,
                                                                  DataInstanceCollection trainData)
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from class: AbstractMachineLearner
This method is used by custom machine learner classes either 1) to select features that the algorithm determines to be most relevant to the dependent variable, or 2) to rank all features according to their relevance to the dependent variable. If feature selection is used, the features should still be ranked, if possible.

Specified by:
SelectOrRankFeatures in class AbstractMachineLearner
algorithmParameters - General parameter values that are used by the machine learner to execute. These are usually stored in the FeatureSelectionParameters.txt file in the Config directory.
trainData - Training data instances
Returns:
A list of data point names, ranked according to their perceived relevance to the dependent variable
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

TrainTest

public ModelPredictions TrainTest(java.lang.String commandTemplate,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> algorithmParameters,
                                  DataInstanceCollection trainingData,
                                  DataInstanceCollection testData)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from class: AbstractMachineLearner
This method is used by custom machine learner classes to perform classification.

Specified by:
TrainTest in class AbstractMachineLearner
algorithmParameters - General parameter values that are used by the machine learner to perform classification. These parameters are usually stored in the ClassificationParameters.txt file in the Config directory.
trainingData - Training data instances
testData - Test data instances
Returns:
Predictions for each test data instance
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
